      • tryToConnect

        private static void tryToConnect(java.lang.String address,
                                 java.lang.Integer port)
        Connects to a server, depending on if it is passworded, the user will be asked to enter a password. If the server is not reachable the user can not connect.
        Parameters:
        address - server ip
        port - server port
